attributes.action: Link maintenence payments and visition no pay no see
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my petition is simple i have a six year old who's father refuses to pay even though he has a deductions of earnings he still gets away with paying but has equal rights. I think that courts should have the power to stop an absent parent from seeing the child in question if no payment/commitment is made by the absent parent. I think its disgusting my ex gets the same rights and never pays a peeny and he works full time and also gets legal aid my husband defends our country i have a disabled son and dont get help/legal aid.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
